definition: an event that fails badly or is totally ineffectual, to throw explosives at or attack with explosives
details:
noun
- an event that fails badly or is totally ineffectual
= synonyms: turkey
- an explosive device fused to explode under specific conditions
- strong sealed vessel for measuring heat of combustion
= synonyms: bomb calorimeter
verb
- to throw explosives at or attack with explosives
= example: to throw explosives at or attack with explosives
= synonyms: bombard
- to fail to get a passing grade
= example: to fail to get a passing grade
= synonyms: flunk
